body:
@bradfitz @adg I managed to reproduce it via the go http client in a [third unit test](https://gist.github.com/tleyden/d7d66e06f82e79ec95dc#file-testreadmultipartbody3) -- the only difference from the second unit test is that it explicitly [sets the boundary string](https://gist.github.com/tleyden/d7d66e06f82e79ec95dc#file-testreadmultipartbody3-L67) to `-9PWGbT-1_r1QpgvW0I-4E3` in the client side mulitpart writer.

[Test output](https://gist.github.com/tleyden/d7d66e06f82e79ec95dc#file-test-output)
